title: CDTV｜艾未未工作室：花脸巴儿
content:
艾未未工作室。 艾未未和他的助手从事的四川大地震学生死亡名单调查，和与政府部门冲突的经历。 Ai Weiwei Studio. The film documented the investigation on the students killed in the 2008 Si Chuan earthquake conducted by Ai Weiwei and his Volunteering group. It also involves the confrontation from the government trying to stop the investigation in the fear that corruption will be revealed behind the hundreds of collapsed school buildings.

艾未未工作室：花脸巴儿
